fields.description: Instructions for delivering an order.

fields.name: TotalAdjustmentAmount
fields.description: The total amount of all promotional adjustments on the cart delivery group. This field is available in API version 54.0 and later. For product bundles, this includes the aggregate adjustments of all child components.

fields.name: TotalAdjustmentTaxAmount
fields.description: The total tax amount for all promotional adjustments on the cart delivery group. This field is available in API version 54.0 and later. For product bundles, this includes the aggregate of the tax amounts for all child components’ adjustments.

fields.name: TotalAmount
fields.description: The sum of all cart items TotalPrice , or TotalProductAmount plus TotalChargeAmount . For product bundles, this includes the aggregate of all child component prices.

fields.name: TotalCartItemCount
fields.description: The number of cart items, including their quantities, of the type PRODUCT in the delivery group. For product bundles, this count includes only the parent component.

fields.name: TotalChargeAmount
fields.description: The sum of all the cart items TotalPrice for all cart items of type CHARGE . Cart items can be of type Product or Charge. For product bundles, if a child component includes a cart item of type CHARGE , its amount is aggregated with the parent’s cart item's total charge amount.

fields.name: TotalChargeTaxAmount
fields.description: The sum of all the cart items TotalTaxAmount for all cart items of type CHARGE . Cart items can be of type Product or Charge. For product bundles, this includes the aggregate of all tax amounts associated with bundle-level charges, including the taxes of individual child products.

fields.name: TotalProductAmount
fields.description: The sum of all the cart items TotalPrice for all cart items of type PRODUCT . Cart items can be of type Product or Charge. For product bundles, this includes the aggregate of all child component prices.

fields.name: TotalProductTaxAmount
fields.description: The sum of all the cart items TotalTaxAmount for all cart items of type PRODUCT . Cart items can be of type Product or Charge. For product bundles, this includes the aggregate of all child component taxes based on their individual prices.

fields.name: TotalTaxAmount
fields.description: The sum of all cart items TotalTaxAmount , or the combined value of TotalProductTaxAmount plus TotalChargeTaxAmount . For product bundles, this includes the aggregate of all child component taxes based on their individual prices.

fields.name: AdjustedShippingFee
fields.description: Shipping fee, including TotalAdjustmentAmount , for the delivery method.

fields.name: Carrier
fields.description: The carrier that the buyer chose for their delivery method. Values are defined based on the user’s shipping service. This field is available in API version 59.0 or later.

fields.name: CartCheckoutSessionId
fields.description: The unique ID used to identify your cart checkout session.

fields.name: CartDeliveryGroupId
fields.description: The ID of the cart delivery group associated with the checkout session.

fields.name: ClassOfService
fields.description: The carrier class of service that the buyer chose for their delivery method. Values are defined based on the user’s shipping service. This field is available in API version 59.0 or later.

fields.name: CurrencyIsoCode
fields.description: The currency used for your shipping fee. Default value is USD .

fields.name: DeliveryMethodId
fields.description: The ID of the selected order delivery method.

fields.name: ExternalProvider
fields.description: The ID of the external shipping method provider. Optional field.

fields.name: IsActive
fields.description: Assign new delivery groups to active delivery methods. The default value is False . This field is available in API version 59.0 or later.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the delivery method.

fields.name: ProcessTime
fields.description: Merchant-specified process time for the delivery method. Process time includes the time between when an order is placed and when the shipment is given to the shipping carrier.

fields.name: ProcessTimeUnit
fields.description: Unit of time used to define ProcessTime .

fields.name: ProductId
fields.description: Optional. This product represents a delivery charge order product for a delivery using this delivery method. For example, you could create a product that represents an overnight express charge and assign it to an overnight express delivery method. If your store uses Salesforce Native Shipping , the ProductId is selected from a non-variation product with Shipping in its name. The term Shipping in a product name isn’t localized. If no matching product is found, a random non-variation product is used. This field is available in API version 59.0 or later.

fields.name: ReferenceNumber
fields.description: Reference number for an external delivery method. This field is available in API version 59.0 or later.

fields.name: ShippingFee
fields.description: Shipping fee associated with the delivery method. Required field.

fields.name: TotalAdjustmentAmount
fields.description: The adjustment amount of a promotion applicable to the delivery method.

fields.name: TransitTimeMax
fields.description: Maximum estimate of transit time for the delivery method. Transit time includes the time between when a shipping carrier receives a shipment and when the shipment arrives at the delivery address.

fields.name: TransitTimeMin
fields.description: Minimum estimate of transit time for the delivery method. Transit time includes the time between when a shipping carrier receives a shipment and when the shipment arrives at the delivery address.

fields.name: TransitTimeUnit
fields.description: Unit of time used to define TransitTimeMax and TransitTimeMin .

fields.name: WebCartId
fields.description: The ID of the WebCart associated with the cart delivery group method. Required field.

fields.name: AdjustmentAmount
fields.description: Amount subtracted from the price by the shipping promotion discount.

fields.name: AdjustmentBasisReferenceId
fields.description: ID of the adjustment basis reference. This is the coupon that causes the adjustment. This field is a relationship field.

fields.name: AdjustmentType
fields.description: Type of shipping promotion discount.

fields.name: AdjustmentValue
fields.description: Number representing the value of the price adjustment. For example, if the AdjustmentType is AdjustmentPercentage , a -10 AdjustmentValue means 10 percent off. If the AdjustmentType is AdjustmentAmount , a -10 AdjustmentValue means 10 dollars off.

fields.name: CartDeliveryGroupMethodId
fields.description: ID of the cart delivery group method.

fields.name: CurrencyIsoCode
fields.description: Currency ISO code of the cart.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the cart delivery group method adjustment.

fields.name: PriceAdjustmentCauseId
fields.description: ID of the price adjustment cause.

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: If there are multiple promotional adjustments, the order in which the shipping promotion is applied.

fields.name: AdjustmentAmount
fields.description: Non-itemized adjustments for this cart item.

fields.name: AdjustmentTax​Amount
fields.description: The tax that’s calculated on the AdjustmentAmount .

fields.name: AssociatedItem​Pricing
fields.description: Specifies how a child cart item is priced relative to its parent cart item within a product bundle. This field is null for standalone products that aren't part of a bundle. Available in API version 65.0 and later. Possible values are: IncludedInBundlePrice —Indicates that the parent product’s price includes the aggregated prices of its child components. NotIncludedInBundlePrice —Indicates that the parent product’s price doesn’t include the aggregated prices of its child components.

fields.name: BillingFrequency
fields.description: Specifies how often a subscription is billed. Available in API version 59.0 and later. Possible values are: Annual MilestonePlan Monthly Quarterly Semi-Annual

fields.name: CartDelivery​GroupId
fields.description: The ID of the CartDeliveryGroup that’s associated with a cart item.

fields.name: CartId
fields.description: The ID of the WebCart that’s associated with a cart item.

fields.name: ChildProduct​Count
fields.description: The total number of child products associated with this cart item. If a child product is a bundle, its own ChildProductCount is included in this total. For simple products that don’t have any child products, the ChildProductCount value is zero.

fields.name: Configure​DuringSale
fields.description: Specify whether a product bundle is configurable. Available in API version 65.0 and later. Possible values are: Allowed NotAllowed

fields.name: CurrencyIsoCode
fields.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD . Possible values are:

fields.name: DistributedAdjustment​Amount
fields.description: A calculated field that determines the amount of a cart-wide promotional adjustment when distributed across all items in the cart. This field is for display purposes only and is valid only during checkout. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: DistributedAdjustment​TaxAmount
fields.description: A calculated field that determines the amount of a cart-wide tax adjustment due to promotions when distributed across all items in the cart. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: FirstPymtPriceAferAdjustments
fields.description: The first term price for term-based subscription products, after price adjustments are applied. The total amount for a non-subscription product or a non-term based subscription product, after price adjustments are applied. This is available in API version 60.0 and later.

fields.name: FirstPymtTax
fields.description: The tax for the first term price for term-based subscription products. The tax amount for a non-subscription product or a non-term subscription product. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

fields.name: GrossAdjustment​Amount
fields.description: The gross amount of the price adjustment on the cart item (tax inclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: GrossUnitPrice
fields.description: The gross amount of the unit price for a cart item (tax inclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: IsShippingChargeNot​Applicable
fields.description: Indicates whether shipping charges are applicable ( true ) or not ( false ) to the cart item. The default value is false .

fields.name: ItemizedAdjustment​Amount
fields.description: A calculated field that determines the total amount of promotional adjustments that are specific to an item. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: ItemizedAdjustment​TaxAmount
fields.description: A calculated field that determines the total amount of promotion-related tax adjustments that are specific to an item. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: ListPrice
fields.description: The original price of the cart item. Typically shown with a line through it. List price is shown only when it’s higher than the negotiated price. If the list price is the same or lower, it isn’t shown to the buyer. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of this CartItem record. Name can be up to 255 characters.

fields.name: NetAdjustment​Amount
fields.description: The net amount of the price adjustment made on the cart item (tax exclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: NetUnitPrice
fields.description: The net amount of the unit price for the cart item (tax exclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: NetUnitPriceAfterAdjustments
fields.description: The net unit price for a cart item, after all tier and promotional price adjustments are applied. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

fields.name: ParentCart​ItemId
fields.description: The ID of the cart item's parent CartItem . The value is empty if the item is a top-level cart item.

fields.name: PerUnitWeight
fields.description: Weight per unit of this cart item, in the unit specified by WeightUnit . This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

fields.name: PeriodBoundary
fields.description: The. Default value is . Possible values are: AlignToCalendar Anniversary DayOfPeriod LastDayOfPeriod

fields.name: PeriodBoundaryDay
fields.description: The .

fields.name: PeriodBoundaryStartMonth
fields.description: The. Default value is . Possible values are: 1 —January 10 —October 11 —November 12 —December 2 —February 3 —March 4 —April 5 —May 6 —June 7 —July 8 —August 9 —September

fields.name: PriceBookEntryId
fields.description: The ID of the price book entry for the product. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

fields.name: PricingTermCount
fields.description: A calculated field that indicates the number of pricing terms in the subscription. This field is available in API version 59.0 and later.

fields.name: Product2Id
fields.description: The ID of a product type cart item. Cart items can be of type PRODUCT or CHARGE .

fields.name: ProductClass
fields.description: The product class of the cart item. Default value is Simple . Possible values are: Bundle Set Simple Variation VariationParent

fields.name: ProductRelated​ComponentId
fields.description: The ID of the cart item's ProductRelatedComponent . The ProductRelatedComponent represents a product that is included in a product bundle, a set, or a product and an add-on. The ProductRelatedComponent is empty if the item is a top-level cart item.

fields.name: ProductSellingModelId
fields.description: The ID of the model used to sell a product. This field is available in API version 59.0 or later.

fields.name: ProductValidation​Key
fields.description: The product validation key of the cart item.

fields.name: ProductRelationship​TypeId
fields.description: The ID of the product relationship type that defines the relationship between a product bundle and its child product. Available in API version 65.0 and later.

fields.name: ProrationPolicyId
fields.description: The ID of the proration policy, which defines how prices are calculated for each time period within a subscription term. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: The number of a given cart item in a cart.

fields.name: QuantityScaleMethod
fields.description: Determines how a child product's quantity scales when added to a cart or configured within a product bundle. Available in API version 65.0 and later. Possible values are: Constant —Represents a value that remains fixed relative to the parent bundle. Proportional —Represents a value that varies in proportion to the parent bundle’s price or quantity.

fields.name: SalesPrice
fields.description: The discounted price of a cart item.

fields.name: SellingModelType
fields.description: The type of the product selling model associated with a term-based subscription product. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later. Possible values are: Evergreen OneTime TermDefined The default value is OneTime .

fields.name: Sku
fields.description: The Shelf-Keeping Unit ID of a cart item.

fields.name: StockCheck​Method
fields.description: Determines how inventory is assessed for a cart item that’s part of a bundle or set. Possible values are: ChildProducts —Inventory is assessed based on the child product or products. ParentProduct —Inventory is assessed based on the parent product.

fields.name: SubType
fields.description: Specifies the subtype of the product. Possible values are: Bonus —Bonus product. GiftWrap —Gift wrapped product.

fields.name: SubscriptionTerm
fields.description: The number of terms (years or months, for example) in the subscription. This field is available in API version 59.0 and later.

fields.name: TaxTreatment​Id
fields.description: The ID of the related tax treatment for the cart item. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later. This field is available with Subscription Management.

fields.name: TotalAdjustment​Amount
fields.description: The total amount of all promotional adjustments on the item, both distributed and itemized. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalAmount
fields.description: The total cost of this cart item, including taxes and adjustments.

fields.name: TotalFirstPymtAdjAmount
fields.description: The total adjustment amount for the first payment of a term-based susbcription product. The TotalAdjustmentAmount for non-subscription products and non-term based subscription products. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalFirstPymtListPrice
fields.description: The first-payment amount for a term-based subscription product, based on the product's ListPrice. This is the same value as TotalListPrice for non-subscription products or non-term based subscription products. This price is only for comparison, and not the price at which the buyer purchases a product. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalFirstPymtPrice
fields.description: The first term price for term-based subscription products. The price of a line item for non-subscription products and non-term based subscription products. This price includes price adjustments and excludes taxes. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalLine​Amount
fields.description: Total amount for this cart item, based on sales price and quantity.

fields.name: TotalLineFirstPymtAmount
fields.description: The first term price for term-based subscripiton products, calculated based on the sales price and quantity, before any price adjustments are made. This is the same value as TotalLineAmount for non-subscription products and non-term based subscription products. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalLineFirstPymtTaxAmount
fields.description: The tax on the first payment amount, after price adjustments, for term-based subscription products. The tax on the price of the product for non-subscription products and non-term based subscription products. Taxes are also calculated on the delivery charge items. This field is a calculated field. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalLineGross​Amount
fields.description: The total gross amount of the line item (tax inclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalLineNet​Amount
fields.description: The total net amount of the line item (tax exclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalLineTax​Amount
fields.description: Total tax amount for TotalLineAmount .

fields.name: TotalListPrice
fields.description: Total amount for this cart item, based on ListPrice . We provide this value for comparison. It's not the price that the buyer is paying.

fields.name: TotalPrice
fields.description: Total amount for this cart item, including adjustments but excluding taxes.

fields.name: TotalPriceAfterAll​Adjustments
fields.description: Total price after all price adjustments are applied. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalPrice​TaxAmount
fields.description: Total tax amount for a cart item before promotional adjustments, including quantity-based adjustments. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalPromo​AdjustmentAmount
fields.description: Total itemized and distributed adjustment amount in cart (only for promotions). This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalPromoAdjustment​TaxAmount
fields.description: Total itemized and distributed adjustment tax amount in cart (only for promotions). This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalTaxAmount
fields.description: Total tax amount for this cart item. This value includes taxes for both TotalLineAmount and AdjustmentAmount .

fields.name: TotalWeight
fields.description: Total weight of this cart item, in the unit specified by WeightUnit . This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The CartItem type. Possible values are: Product Charge

fields.name: UnitAdjusted​Price
fields.description: Price per quantity unit after a tier discount or surcharge is applied. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

fields.name: UnitAdjustedPrice​WithItemAdj
fields.description: Unit price, including both tier and item level discounts, for the item.

fields.name: UnitAdjustment​Amount
fields.description: Tier discount or surcharge to apply to a quantity unit. This amount is added to the SalesPrice to get the UnitAdjustedPrice . This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

fields.name: UnitItemAdjustment​Amount
fields.description: Item level adjustments made to the unit price for the item.

fields.name: UnitPriceAfterAdjustments
fields.description: The unit price for a cart item, after tier and promotional price adjustments are applied. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

fields.name: WeightUnit
fields.description: Unit of measurement for the weight of the cart item. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

fields.name: AttributeDefinitionId
fields.description: The ID of the attribute definition associated with the cart item attribute.

fields.name: AttributeName
fields.description: The name of the cart item attribute.

fields.name: AttributePicklistValueId
fields.description: The ID of the picklist value associated with the cart item attribute.

fields.name: AttributeValue
fields.description: The value of the cart item attribute, such as Blue or Large.

fields.name: CartItemId
fields.description: The ID of the cart item to which this attribute is assigned.

fields.name: ExternalId
fields.description: An auto-generated ID for the attribute record that's stored in an external system, such as the HBase database.

fields.name: IsPriceImpacting
fields.description: Indicates whether the attribute affects cart pricing ( true ) or not ( false ). This field determines whether the Commerce Pricing API calls must be triggered to update the price.

fields.name: UnitOfMeasure
fields.description: The ID of the unit of measure associated with the cart item attribute.

fields.name: AdjustmentAmountScope
fields.description: Scope of the adjustment amount for a promotion.

fields.name: AdjustmentBasisReferenceId
fields.description: Coupon code of the coupon associated with a promotion. This field is available in API version 54.0 and later.

fields.name: AdjustmentSource
fields.description: Price adjustment type.

fields.name: AdjustmentTargetType
fields.description: Target for the price adjustment (the cart itself or individual items).

fields.name: AdjustmentType
fields.description: Indicates if the price adjustment is applied as percentage or an absolute amount.

fields.name: AdjustmentValue
fields.description: Numeric value of the adjustment (for example, 10 if the price adjustment is either 10% off or $10 off).

fields.name: CartId
fields.description: The ID of the WebCart that’s associated with a cart item. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: CartItemId
fields.description: ID of the parent cart item to which this adjustment belongs.

fields.name: CurrencyIsoCode
fields.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD .

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the price adjustment.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the price adjustment.

fields.name: PriceAdjustmentCauseId
fields.description: ID of entity that caused this adjustment (for example, a promotion ID). If unspecified, then Description populates the display name.

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: If there are multiple price adjustments, sequence in which the price adjustments are applied.

fields.name: TotalAmount
fields.description: Total price after applying price adjustments.

fields.name: TotalGrossAmount
fields.description: The total gross amount (tax inclusive) after applying price adjustments. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalNetAmount
fields.description: The total net amount (tax exclusive) after applying price adjustments. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

fields.name: TotalTax
fields.description: Tax on the total adjusted price.

fields.name: WebCartAdjustmentGroupId
fields.description: ID of the cart’s adjustment group.

fields.name: AdjustmentTargetType
fields.description: Target for the price adjustment (the cart itself or individual items). This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

fields.name: Amount
fields.description: Calculated tax amount.

fields.name: CartId
fields.description: The ID of the WebCart being taxed.

fields.name: CartItemId
fields.description: The ID of a cart item being taxed.

fields.name: CartItemPriceAdjustmentId
fields.description: The ID of a price adjustment for a cart item being taxed. (This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.)

fields.name: CurrencyIsoCode
fields.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD . Valid values include:

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A description of the tax. Enter up to 2000 characters.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of this CartTax record. Name can be up to 255 characters.

fields.name: TaxCalculationDate
fields.description: The date this tax was calculated.

fields.name: TaxRate
fields.description: The applied tax rate for this line of tax.

fields.name: TaxType
fields.description: The type of tax for this line of tax. Possible values are: Actual Estimated

fields.name: BackgroundOperationId
fields.description: ID of the background operation that ran the validation.

fields.name: CartId
fields.description: ID of the related WebCart .

fields.name: CurrencyIsoCode
fields.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD .Possible values are:

fields.name: IsDismissed
fields.description: Indicates whether the validation process is finished. Default value is false .

fields.name: Level
fields.description: Describes the type of output resulting from the validation process. Possible values are: 0 ( Info ) 1 ( Error ) 2 ( Warning )

fields.name: Message
fields.description: Defines the message to show in the log when validation is complete. Message can be up to 255 characters.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of this CartValidationOutput record. Name can be up to 255 characters.

fields.name: RelatedEntityId
fields.description: Foreign key to WebCart , CartItem , and CartDeliveryGroup .

fields.name: RelatedEntityPrefix
fields.description: Three-character prefix for the related entity.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The CartValidationOutput type. Possible values are: CartSave — Available in API version 64.0 and later. Entitlement Inventory Other Pricing Promotions Shipping ShippingPromotions SystemError Taxes

fields.name: AccountId
fields.description: ID of the account associated with this case.

fields.name: AssetWarrantyID
fields.description: ID of the Asset associated with the warranty. Must be a valid asset warranty ID.

fields.name: BusinessHoursId
fields.description: ID of the business hours associated with this case.

fields.name: Comments
fields.description: Used to insert a new CaseComment. Email textarea has a length of 4000 chars.

fields.name: CaseNumber
fields.description: Assigned automatically when each case is inserted. It can't be set directly, and it can't be modified after the case is created.

fields.name: ClosedDate
fields.description: The date and time when the case was closed.

fields.name: CommunityId
fields.description: ID of the zone associated with this case.

fields.name: ConnectionReceivedId
fields.description: ID of the PartnerNetworkConnection that shared this record with your organization. This field is available if you enabled Salesforce to Salesforce.

fields.name: ConnectionSentId
fields.description: ID of the PartnerNetworkConnection that you shared this record with. This field is available if you enabled Salesforce to Salesforce. This field is supported using API versions earlier than 15.0. In all other API versions, this field’s value is null. You can use the new PartnerNetworkRecordConnection object to forward records to connections.

fields.name: ContactEmail
fields.description: Email address for the contact. The Case.ContactEmail field displays the Email field on the contact that is referenced by Case.ContactId. Label is Contact Email . This field is available in API version 38.0 and later.

fields.name: ContactFax
fields.description: Fax number for the contact. Label is Contact Fax . This field is available in API version 38.0 and later.

fields.name: ContactId
fields.description: ID of the associated contact.

fields.name: ContactMobile
fields.description: Mobile telephone number for the contact. Label is Contact Mobile . This field is available in API version 38.0 and later.

fields.name: ContactPhone
fields.description: Telephone number for the contact. Label is Contact Phone . This field is available in API version 38.0 and later.

fields.name: CreatorFullPhotoUrl
fields.description: URL of the user’s profile photo from the feed. Chatter Answers must be enabled to view this field. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later.

fields.name: CreatorName
fields.description: Name of the user who posted the question or reply. Only the first name of internal users (agents) appears to portal users in the feed. Chatter Answers must be enabled to view this field. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later.

fields.name: CreatorSmallPhotoUrl
fields.description: URL of the user’s thumbnail photo from the feed. Chatter Answers must be enabled to view this field. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A text description of the case. Limit: 32 KB.

fields.name: FeedItemId
fields.description: ID of the question in Chatter associated with the case. This field is available in API version 33.0 and later, and is only accessible in organizations where Question-to-Case is enabled.

fields.name: HasCommentsUnreadByOwner
fields.description: Indicates whether a case contains comments that the case owner hasn’t read ( true ) or not ( false ).

fields.name: HasSelfServiceComments
fields.description: Indicates whether a case has comments added by a Self-Service user ( true ) or not ( false ). Only visible when Customer Portal is enabled.

fields.name: IsClosed
fields.description: Indicates whether the case is closed ( true ) or open ( false ). This field is controlled by the Status field; it can't be set directly. Label is Closed .

fields.name: IsClosedOnCreate
fields.description: Indicates whether the case was closed at the same time that it was created ( true ) or not ( false ). This flag is read-only and is automatically set when a record is created. It can't be set to true unless the IsClosed flag is also true .

fields.name: IsDeleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin ( true ) or not ( false ). Label is Deleted .

fields.name: IsEscalated
fields.description: Indicates whether the case has been escalated ( true ) or not. A case's escalated state does not affect how you can use a case, or whether you can query, delete, or update it. You can set this flag via the API. Label is Escalated .

fields.name: IsSelfServiceClosed
fields.description: Indicates whether the case is closed for Self-Service users ( true ) or not ( false ).

fields.name: IsStopped
fields.description: Indicates whether an entitlement process on a case is stopped ( true ) or not ( false ).

fields.name: IsVisibleInSelfService
fields.description: Indicates whether the case can be viewed in the Customer Service Portal, Partner Service Portal, and Self-Service Portal ( true ) or not ( false ). This field is applied for case visibility in the Partner Relationship Management, Customer Service Portal, and the earlier version of Self Service Portal. The field does not alter sharing and will not prevent usage of a direct URL to a case if a portal user has read or write access.

fields.name: Language
fields.description: The language of the case. The Language field is available when you enable Einstein Case Classification in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited edition orgs with Service Cloud. By default, only Einstein classification apps use this field.

fields.name: LastReferencedDate
fields.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

fields.name: LastViewedDate
fields.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view ( LastReferencedDate ) but not viewed it.

fields.name: MasterRecordId
fields.description: If this object was deleted as the result of a merge, this field contains the ID of the record that was kept. If this object was deleted for any other reason, or has not been deleted, the value is null .

fields.name: Origin
fields.description: The source of the case, such as Email , Phone , or Web . Label is Case Origin .

fields.name: OwnerId
fields.description: ID of the contact who owns the case.

fields.name: ParentId
fields.description: The ID of the parent case in the hierarchy. The label is Parent Case .

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: The importance or urgency of the case, such as High , Medium , or Low .

fields.name: QuestionId
fields.description: The question in the answers zone that is associated with the case. This field does not appear if you don't have an answers zone enabled.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the case was created, such as Instructions not clear , or User didn’t attend training .

fields.name: RecordTypeId
fields.description: ID of the record type assigned to this object.

fields.name: ServiceContractId
fields.description: Required. ID of the ServiceContract associated with the entitlement. Must be a valid ID.

fields.name: SlaStartDate
fields.description: Shows the time that the case entered an entitlement process. If you have the Edit permission on cases, you can update or reset the time.

fields.name: SourceId
fields.description: The ID of the social post source.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the case, such as New, Closed, or Escalated. This field directly controls the IsClosed flag. Each predefined Status value implies an IsClosed flag value. For more information, see CaseStatus.

fields.name: StopStartDate
fields.description: The date and time an entitlement process was stopped on the case. This field is available in API version 18.0 and later.

fields.name: Subject
fields.description: The subject of the case. Limit: 255 characters.

fields.name: SuppliedCompany
fields.description: The company name that was entered when the case was created. Label is Company .

fields.name: SuppliedEmail
fields.description: The email address that was entered when the case was created. Label is Email . If your organization has an active auto-response rule, SuppliedEmail is required when creating a case via the API. Auto-response rules use the email in the contact specified by ContactId . If no email address is in the contact record, the email specified here is used.

fields.name: SuppliedName
fields.description: The name that was entered when the case was created. Label is Name .

fields.name: SuppliedPhone
fields.description: The phone number that was entered when the case was created. Label is Phone .

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of case, such as Feature Request or Question .

fields.name: ArticleLanguage
fields.description: The language of the article associated with the case.

fields.name: ArticleVersionNumber
fields.description: The number assigned to a version of an article. This field is available in API version 24.0 and later.

fields.name: CaseId
fields.description: ID of the Case associated with the KnowledgeArticle.

fields.name: IsSharedByEmail
fields.description: Indicates that the article has been shared with the customer through an email.

fields.name: KnowledgeArticleId
fields.description: ID of the KnowledgeArticle associated with the Case.

fields.name: CommentBody
fields.description: Text of the CaseComment. The maximum size of the comment body is 4,000 bytes. Label is Body .

fields.name: ConnectionReceivedId
fields.description: ID of the PartnerNetworkConnection that shared this record with your organization. This field is available if you enabled Salesforce to Salesforce.

fields.name: ConnectionSentId
fields.description: ID of the PartnerNetworkConnection that you shared this record with. This field is available if you enabled Salesforce to Salesforce. This field is supported using API versions earlier than 15.0. In all other API versions, this field’s value is null. You can use the new PartnerNetworkRecordConnection object to forward records to connections.

fields.name: CreatorFullPhotoUrl
fields.description: URL of the user’s profile photo from the feed. Chatter Answers must be enabled to view this field. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later.

fields.name: CreatorName
fields.description: Name of the user who posted the question or reply. Only the first name of internal users (agents) appears to portal users in the feed. Chatter Answers must be enabled to view this field. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later.

fields.name: CreatorSmallPhotoUrl
fields.description: URL of the user’s thumbnail photo from the feed. Chatter Answers must be enabled to view this field. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later.

fields.name: IsDeleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin ( true ) or not ( false ). Label is Deleted .

fields.name: IsNotificationSelected
fields.description: Indicates whether an email notification is sent to the case contact when a CaseComment is created or updated. When this field is queried, it always returns null. This field is available only when the Enable Case Comment Notification to Contacts setting is enabled on the Support Settings page in Setup. To send email notifications for CaseComment, you must use the EmailHeader triggerUserEmail . Available in API version 43.0 and later.

fields.name: IsPublished
fields.description: Indicates whether the CaseComment is visible to customers in the Self-Service portal ( true ) or not ( false ). Label is Published . This is the only CaseComment field that can be updated via the API.

fields.name: ParentId
fields.description: Required. ID of the parent Case of the CaseComment.

fields.name: CasesId
fields.description: ID of the cases associated with this contact.

fields.name: ContactId
fields.description: Required. ID of the contact.

fields.name: IsDeleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin ( true ) or not ( false ). Label is Deleted .

fields.name: Role
fields.description: Name of the role played by the contact on this case, such as Technical Contact, Business Contact, Decision Maker, and so on. Must be unique—there can't be multiple records in which the CaseId , ContactId , and Role values are identical. Different contacts can play the same role on the same case. A contact can play different roles on the same case.

fields.name: CaseId
fields.description: ID of the Case associated with this record.

fields.name: DataType
fields.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

fields.name: Field
fields.description: Name of the case field that was modified, or a special value to indicate some other modification to the case. The possible values, in addition to the case field names, are: ownerAssignment —The owner of the case was changed. ownerAccepted —A user took ownership of a case from a queue. ownerEscalated —The owner of the case was changed due to case escalation. external —A user made the case visible to customers in the Customer Self-Service Portal.

fields.name: IsDeleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin ( true ) or not ( false ). Label is Deleted .

fields.name: NewValue
fields.description: New value of the modified case field. Maximum of 255 characters.

fields.name: OldValue
fields.description: Previous value of the modified case field. Maximum of 255 characters.

fields.name: CaseId
fields.description: The ID of the Case associated with this record.

fields.name: IsDeleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin ( true ) or not ( false ). Label is Deleted .

fields.name: OwnerId
fields.description: The ID of the contact who owns the case.

fields.name: PreviousUpdate
fields.description: The date and time when the case was last updated.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the case, such as New , Closed , or Escalated .

fields.name: BusinessHoursId
fields.description: ID of the BusinessHours associated with the CaseMilestone.

fields.name: CaseId
fields.description: ID of the case.

fields.name: CompletionDate
fields.description: The date and time the milestone was completed.

fields.name: ElapsedTimeInDays
fields.description: The time required to complete a milestone in days.

fields.name: ElapsedTimeInHrs
fields.description: The time required to complete a milestone in hours.

fields.name: ElapsedTimeInMins
fields.description: The time required to complete a milestone in minutes.

fields.name: IsCompleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the milestone is completed ( true ) or not ( false ).

fields.name: IsViolated
fields.description: Indicates whether the milestone is violated ( true ) or not ( false ).

fields.name: MilestoneTypeId
fields.description: The ID of the milestone on the case.

fields.name: StartDate
fields.description: The date and time the milestone started on the case.

fields.name: TargetDate
fields.description: The date and time the milestone must be completed.

fields.name: TargetResponseInDays
fields.description: The time to complete the milestone in days.

fields.name: TargetResponseInHrs
fields.description: The time to complete the milestone in hours.

fields.name: TargetResponseInMins
fields.description: The time to complete the milestone in minutes.

fields.name: TimeRemainingInDays
fields.description: Time remaining to reach the milestone target, measured in days.

fields.name: TimeRemainingInHrs
fields.description: Time remaining to reach the milestone target, measured in hours.

fields.name: TimeRemainingInMins
fields.description: Time remaining to reach the milestone target. The format is minutes and seconds.

fields.name: TimeSinceTargetInDays
fields.description: The time elapsed since the milestone target, measured in days.

fields.name: TimeSinceTargetInHrs
fields.description: The time elapsed since the milestone target, measured in hours.

fields.name: TimeSinceTargetInMins
fields.description: The time elapsed since the milestone target. The format is minutes and seconds.

fields.name: CaseAccessLevel
fields.description: A value that represents the type of sharing being allowed. The possible values are: Read Edit

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A description of the sharing rule. Maximum size is 1000 characters. This field is available in API version 29.0 and later.

fields.name: DeveloperName
fields.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a subscriber’s organization. Corresponds to Rule Name in the user interface. This field is available in API version 24.0 and later. Note When creating large sets of data, always specify a unique DeveloperName for each record. If no DeveloperName is specified, performance may slow while Salesforce generates one for each record.

fields.name: GroupId
fields.description: The ID representing the source group. Cases owned by users in the source group trigger the rule to give access.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Label of the sharing rule as it appears in the user interface. Limited to 80 characters. Corresponds to Label on the user interface.

fields.name: UserOrGroupId
fields.description: The ID representing the target user or group. Target users or groups are given access.

fields.name: AuthorizationProof
fields.description: How the participant communicated their consent. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

fields.name: CaseId
fields.description: The case associated with the case participant record.

fields.name: LastReferencedDate
fields.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

fields.name: LastViewedDate
fields.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, possibly the user only accessed this record or list view ( LastReferencedDate ) but didn't view it.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the case participant record.

fields.name: ParticipantId
fields.description: The participant associated with the case participant record.

fields.name: PreferredCallTimeFrom
fields.description: The start of the preferred time window for contacting the participant. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

fields.name: PreferredCallTimeTo
fields.description: The end of the preferred time window for contacting the participant. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

fields.name: PreferredCommunicationMode
fields.description: How the participant prefers to receive messages. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

fields.name: Role
fields.description: The role of the case participant.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the case participant.

fields.name: CaseId
fields.description: A relationship field that represents the case you're linking a Problem or Incident to.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A brief description of the related case.

fields.name: RelatedEntityType
fields.description: Shows what type of object the related entity is.

fields.name: RelatedIssueId
fields.description: A polymorphic relationship field that represents a related Problem or Incident.

fields.name: RelationshipType
fields.description: Shows how two records relate to each other.

fields.name: UniqueKeyIndex
fields.description: This field is unique within your organization.

fields.name: CaseAccessLevel
fields.description: Level of access that the User or Group has to the Case. The possible values are: Read Edit All This value isn’t valid for creating or deleting records. This field must be set to an access level that is higher than the organization’s default access level for cases.

fields.name: CaseId
fields.description: ID of the Case associated with this sharing entry. This field can't be updated.

fields.name: IsDeleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin ( true ) or not ( false ). Label is Deleted .

fields.name: RowCause
fields.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual . If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual . All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

fields.name: UserOrGroupId
fields.description: ID of the User or Group that has been given access to the Case. This field can't be updated.

fields.name: CaseId
fields.description: Required. ID of the Case associated with the Solution.

fields.name: IsDeleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin ( true ) or not ( false ). Label is Deleted .

fields.name: SolutionId
fields.description: Required. ID of the Solution associated with the case.

fields.name: ApiName
fields.description: Uniquely identifies a picklist value so it can be retrieved without using an id or primary label.

fields.name: IsClosed
fields.description: Indicates whether this case status value represents a closed Case ( true ) or not ( false ). Multiple case status values can represent a closed Case.

fields.name: IsDefault
fields.description: Indicates whether this is the default case status value ( true ) or not ( false ) in the picklist.

fields.name: MasterLabel
fields.description: Label for this case status value. This display value is the internal label that does not get translated.

fields.name: SortOrder
fields.description: Number used to sort this value in the case status picklist. These numbers are not guaranteed to be sequential, as some previous case status values might have been deleted.

fields.name: DeveloperName
fields.description: The unique name for the CaseSubjectParticle object.

fields.name: Index
fields.description: Required. The order in which the custom Case Subject is generated, meaning if the social network is 0 and the social message is 1, then the subject generates as Twitter | Tweet .

fields.name: Language
fields.description: The language of the case subject field.

fields.name: MasterLabel
fields.description: Label for the case subject field.

fields.name: TextField
fields.description: Specifies inbound social content added to Case Subject in case records.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Required. Specifies the custom Case Subject format from which inbound social content appears in case records.

fields.name: ItemId
fields.description: ID of the tagged item.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the tag. If this value does not already exist, a new TagDefinition is created and becomes the parent of this Tag object. Otherwise, a TagDefinition with the same name becomes the parent of this Tag object. Parent relationships are created automatically.

fields.name: TagDefinitionId
fields.description: ID of the parent TagDefinition object that owns the tag.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Defines the visibility of a tag.

fields.name: MemberId
fields.description: The ID of the user or contact who is a member on a case team.

fields.name: ParentId
fields.description: The ID of the case with which the case team member is associated.

fields.name: TeamRoleId
fields.description: The ID of the case team role with which the case team member is associated.

fields.name: TeamTemplateId
fields.description: The ID of the predefined team with which the case team member is associated.

fields.name: TeamTemplateMemberId
fields.description: The ID of the team member included in a predefined case team.

fields.name: AccessLevel
fields.description: A value that represents the type of access granted to the target Group for cases. The possible values are: None Read Edit

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the case team role.

fields.name: PreferencesVisibleInCSP
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the case team role is visible to Customer Portal users.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A text description of the predefined case team.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the predefined case team.

fields.name: MemberId
fields.description: The ID of the user or contact who is a team member on a predefined case team.

fields.name: TeamRoleId
fields.description: The ID of the predefined case team member's case team role.

fields.name: TeamTemplateId
fields.description: The ID of the predefined case team's template.

fields.name: ParentId
fields.description: The ID of the case with which the case team template record is associated.

fields.name: TeamTemplateId
fields.description: The ID of the predefined case team with which the case team template record is associated.

fields.description: ID of the CategoryNode associated with the solution.

fields.name: SortOrder

fields.name: SortStyle

fields.name: CategoryNodeId
fields.description: The ID of the solution CategoryNode that is being translated.

fields.name: NamespacePrefix
fields.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix __ componentName notation. The namespace prefix can have one of the following values. In Developer Edition orgs, NamespacePrefix is set to the namespace prefix of the org for all objects that support it, unless an object is in an installed managed package. In that case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed managed package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer Edition org of the package developer. In orgs that are not Developer Edition orgs, NamespacePrefix is set only for objects that are part of an installed managed package. All other objects have no namespace prefix.

fields.name: Value
fields.description: The actual translated label for the solution category. Label is Translation .

fields.name: BusinessJustification
fields.description: A description of the business reason to implement the change. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters display in reports.

fields.name: BusinessReason
fields.description: The core reason for creating the change request.

fields.name: Category
fields.description: The type of change request. Administrators set field values.

fields.name: ChangeRequestNumber
fields.description: The unique, system-generated change request number.

fields.name: ChangeType
fields.description: The type of change request. Administrators set field values.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A description of the change request. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters display in reports.

fields.name: EstimatedEndTime
fields.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the change request is estimated to be implemented.

fields.name: EstimatedStartTime
fields.description: The estimated date and time (in UTC) when the change request is implemented.

fields.name: FinalReviewDateTime
fields.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the change request was reviewed.

fields.name: FinalReviewNotes
fields.description: Notes left by the change request reviewer. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters display in reports.

fields.name: Impact
fields.description: Shows the impact of a requested change.

fields.name: LastReferencedDate
fields.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

fields.name: LastViewedDate
fields.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view ( LastReferencedDate ) but not viewed it.

fields.name: OwnerId
fields.description: A polymorphic relationship field that represents the user or group assigned as the change reviewer.

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: The impact and urgency of a requested change.

fields.name: RemediationPlan
fields.description: A description of the steps required to resolve the incident. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters display in reports.

fields.name: ReviewerId
fields.description: The ID of the user who reviewed the change request.

fields.name: RiskImpactAnalysis
fields.description: An assessment of the risk involved with the implementation of the change request. Administrators set field values, and each value can have up to 20 characters.

fields.name: RiskLevel
fields.description: The risk level associated with adopting the requested change.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: Represents any custom or granular stages a customer may want to track. This will be a dependent picklist.

fields.name: StatusCode
fields.description: The status of the change.

fields.name: Subject
fields.description: A brief description of the requested change.

fields.name: ChangeRequestId
fields.description: The ChangeRequest ID that's linked to the Problem or Incident.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A description of the change request as it relates to the problem or incident.

fields.name: RelatedEntityType
fields.description: The name of the related object type.

fields.name: RelatedIssueId
fields.description: A polymorphic relationship field that represents the related Problem or Incident.

fields.name: RelationshipType
fields.description: Shows how the ChangeRequest and Incident or Problem records relate to each other.

fields.name: AssetId
fields.description: The Asset ID that’s linked to the ChangeRequest.

fields.name: ChangeRequestId
fields.description: The ChangeRequest ID that’s linked to the Asset.

fields.name: Comment
fields.description: A description of the change request as it relates to the item.

fields.name: ImpactLevel
fields.description: The related item's impact on the change request.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The auto-generated ID of the item that's related to the change request.

fields.name: RelationshipType
fields.description: Shows how the ChangeRequest and Asset records relate to each other.

fields.name: ChangeSetName
fields.description: The name of the change set.

fields.name: ClientIp
fields.description: The IP address of the client that’s using Salesforce services. A Salesforce internal IP (such as a login from AppExchange) is shown as “Salesforce.com IP”.

fields.name: CpuTime
fields.description: The CPU time in milliseconds used to complete the request. This field indicates the amount of activity taking place in the app server layer.

fields.name: LoginKey
fields.description: The string that ties together all events in a given user’s login session. It starts with a login event and ends with either a logout event or the user session expiring.

fields.name: OperationType
fields.description: The operation that’s being performed.

fields.name: RequestIdentifier
fields.description: The unique ID of a single transaction. A transaction can contain one or more events. Each event in a given transaction has the same REQUEST_ID.

fields.name: RunTime
fields.description: The amount of time that the request took in milliseconds.

fields.name: SessionKey
fields.description: The user’s unique session ID. You can use this value to identify all user events within a session. When a user logs out and logs in again, a new session is started.

fields.name: TargetOrganizationIdentifier
fields.description: ID of the organization that’s receiving the change set.

fields.name: Timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp at which the log event was generated.

fields.name: Uri
fields.description: URI of the page receiving the request.

fields.name: UserIdentifier
fields.description: The 15-character ID of the user who’s using Salesforce services through the UI or the API. For example: 00530000009M943 .

fields.name: ActionForNoRecordFound
fields.description: Action to take when no matching records are found.

fields.name: ActionForSingleRecordFound
fields.description: Action to take when one matching record is found.

fields.name: ChannelType
fields.description: The type of channel used for this rule.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description for this linking rule.

fields.name: DeveloperName
fields.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a subscriber’s organization. Note When creating large sets of data, always specify a unique DeveloperName for each record. If no DeveloperName is specified, performance may slow while Salesforce generates one for each record. Note Only users with View DeveloperName OR View Setup and Configuration permission can view, group, sort, and filter this field.

fields.name: IsLinkedRecordOpenedAsSubTab
fields.description: Indicates whether to open the linked record as a subtab when the link is established.

fields.name: IsRuleActive
fields.description: Indicates whether the rule is active.

fields.name: Language
fields.description: The language for this linking rule.

fields.name: MasterLabel
fields.description: The unique label name for this rule.

fields.name: ObjectToLink
fields.description: The type of object to link to the channel interaction.

fields.name: RuleName
fields.description: Name of the rule as it appears in the UI. Maximum length is 80 characters.

fields.name: Category
fields.description: Category of the channel program. Categories group channel programs by type. For example, a reseller category would include all the different regional reseller channel programs.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the channel program.

fields.name: IsActive
fields.description: Indicates whether the channel program is active. New channel programs are inactive by default.

fields.name: LastReferencedDate
fields.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

fields.name: LastViewedDate
fields.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view ( LastReferencedDate ) but not viewed it.

fields.name: CommentReceivedCount

fields.name: LikeReceivedCount

fields.name: QuestionUpVotesReceivedCount

fields.name: RepliesCount

fields.name: ReplyDownVotesCount

fields.name: ReplyDownVotesReceivedCount

fields.name: ReplyUpVotesReceivedCount
fields.description: The number of up votes the User has received from other users on the Reply records he or she has posted.

fields.description: The text to show when a user mouses over your extension’s icon. Mouse-over text is required for Lightning type extensions.

fields.description: The rendering component of the Rich Publisher App that you provide. It’s comprised of the lightning:availableForChatterExtensionRenderer interface. This field requires a value.

fields.description: Describes the type of the extension. Currently, the only value supported is Lightning . Included to allow for other possible types in the future.

fields.name: CanCreate
fields.description: Determines whether the ChatterExtension can create an instance that appears by rendering.

fields.name: CanRead
fields.description: Determines whether the ChatterExtension can be viewed.

fields.description: The ID of the ChatterExtension .

fields.name: Position

fields.name: ConversationId

fields.name: SenderNetworkId
fields.description: ID of the Experience Cloud site from which the message was sent. This field is available only if digital experiences is enabled in your org. This field is available in API version 32.0 and later.

fields.name: SentDate
fields.description: Date the message was sent.

fields.name: FullUserAgent
fields.description: Detailed information about the client (browser). For example, Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.1) Gecko/2008070208 Firefox/3.0.1

fields.name: LastUpdate
fields.description: Represents the last time the cookie was changed.

fields.name: ProxyInfo
fields.description: The browser’s current proxy information.

fields.name: UsersId
fields.description: The ID of the user associated with this item.

fields.name: AnnouncementId
fields.description: Contains the ID of the Announcement last associated with the group. This field is available in API version 30.0 and later.

fields.name: BannerPhotoUrl
fields.description: The URL for the group's banner photo. The URL is updated every time a photo is uploaded and reflects the most recent photo. If a newer photo has been uploaded, the URL returned for an older photo is not guaranteed to return a photo. Query this field for the URL of the most recent photo. This field is available in API version 36.0 and later.

fields.name: CanHaveGuests
fields.description: If set to true , indicates that a group allows customers. Chatter customers are people outside your company's email domains. Customers can see only the groups they're invited to. They can interact only with members of those groups. Customers can’t see any Salesforce information. This field is available starting in API version 23.0, but groups that allow customers are accessible from earlier API versions. However, when accessed from earlier API versions, groups that allow customers aren't distinguishable from private groups. We strongly recommend that you upgrade to the latest API version. If you must use an earlier version, name groups that allow customers to indicate that they include customers.

fields.name: CollaborationType
fields.description: The type of Chatter group. Available values are: Public —Anyone can see and post updates. Anyone can join a public group. Private —Only members can see the group feed and post updates. Non-members can only see the group name and a few other details in list views, search, and on the group page. The group's owner or managers must add members who request to join the group. Unlisted —Only members and users with the Manage Unlisted Groups permission can see the group and post updates. Other users can’t access the group or see it in lists, search, and feeds.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the group.

fields.name: FullPhotoUrl
fields.description: The URL for the group's profile photo. The URL is updated every time a photo is uploaded and reflects the most recent photo. If a newer photo has been uploaded, the URL returned for an older photo is not guaranteed to return a photo. Query this field for the URL of the most recent photo. This field is available in API version 20.0 and later.

fields.name: GroupEmail
fields.description: The email address for posting to the group. For private groups, only visible to members and users with Modify All Data or View All Data permissions. This field is available in API version 29.0 and later.

fields.name: HasPrivateFieldsAccess
fields.description: If set to true , indicates that a user can see the InformationBody and InformationTitle fields in a private group. This field is set to true for members of a private group and users with Modify All Data or View All Data permissions.

fields.name: InformationBody
fields.description: The text of the Information section. For private groups, only visible to members and users with Modify All Data or View All Data permissions.

fields.name: InformationTitle
fields.description: The title of the Information section. For private groups, only visible to members and users with Modify All Data or View All Data permissions.

fields.name: IsArchived
fields.description: Indicates whether the group is archived ( true ) or not ( false ). This field is available in API version 28.0 and later.

fields.name: IsAutoArchiveDisabled
fields.description: Indicates whether automatic archiving is disabled for the group ( true ) or not ( false ). This field is available in API version 29.0 and later.

fields.name: IsBroadcast
fields.description: Indicates whether the group is a broadcast group ( true ) or not ( false ). This field is available in API version 36.0 and later.

fields.name: LastFeedModifiedDate
fields.description: The date of the last post or comment on the group.

fields.name: LastReferencedDate
fields.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

fields.name: LastViewedDate
fields.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced ( LastReferencedDate ) and not viewed.

fields.name: MediumPhotoUrl
fields.description: The URL for the larger, cropped photo size.

fields.name: MemberCount
fields.description: The number of members in the group.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the group. Group names must be unique across public and private groups. Unlisted groups don’t require unique names.

fields.name: NetworkId
fields.description: ID of the Experience Cloud site that this group is part of. This field is available only if digital experiences is enabled in your org. You can only add a NetworkId when creating a group. You can’t change or add a NetworkId for an existing group. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later.

fields.name: OwnerId
fields.description: ID of the owner of the group. Only the current group owner or people with the Modify All Data permission can update the OwnerId .

fields.name: SmallPhotoUrl
fields.description: The URL for a thumbnail of the group's profile photo. The URL is updated every time a photo is uploaded and reflects the most recent photo. If a newer photo has been uploaded, the URL returned for an older photo is not guaranteed to return a photo. Query this field for the URL of the most recent photo. This field is available in API version 20.0 and later.

fields.name: CollaborationGroupId
fields.description: ID of the associated CollaborationGroup.

fields.name: CollaborationRole
fields.description: The role of a group member. Group owners and managers can change roles for members of their groups. The valid values are: Standard —Indicates that a user is a group member. Members can post and comment in the group. Admin —Indicates that a user is a group manager. Managers can post and comment, change member roles, edit group settings, add and remove members, delete posts and comments, and edit the group information field. Note To change the group owner, use the OwnerId field on the CollaborationGroup object.

fields.name: LastFeedAccessDate
fields.description: Date and time when a group member last accessed the group’s feed. The value is only updated when a member explicitly consumes the group’s feed, not when the member sees group posts in other feeds, like the profile feed.

fields.name: MemberId
fields.description: ID of the group member.

fields.name: NotificationFrequency
fields.description: Required. The frequency at which Salesforce sends Chatter group email digests to this member. Can only be set by the member or users with the “Modify All Data” permission. The valid values are: D —Daily W —Weekly N —Never P —On every post The default value is specified by the member in their Chatter email settings. In communities, the Email on every post option is disabled once more than 10,000 members choose this setting for the group. All members who had this option selected are automatically switched to Daily digests .

fields.name: CollaborationGroupId
fields.description: ID of the private Chatter group.

fields.name: RequesterId
fields.description: ID of the user requesting to join the group; must be the ID of the context user.

fields.name: ResponseMessage
fields.description: Optional message to be included in the notification email when Status is Declined .

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the request. Available values are: Accepted Declined Pending

fields.name: CollaborationGroupId

fields.name: NetworkId

fields.name: InvitedUserEmail

fields.name: InvitedUserEmailNormalized
fields.description: A normalized version of the InvitedUserEmail entered. Label is Invited Email (Normalized) .

fields.name: InviterId
fields.description: The person that initiated the invitation.

fields.name: OptionalMessage
fields.description: An optional message from the person sending the invitation to the person receiving it.

fields.name: ParentId
fields.description: Used when the email address on the invitation is different than the one entered when the invitee accepts the invitation.

fields.name: SharedEntityId
fields.description: ID of the user or group associated with this invitation. If the invitation is to join Chatter, the SharedEntityId is the ID of the User that created the invitation. The invitee will auto-follow the inviter. If the invitation is to join a group within Chatter, the SharedEntityId is the ID of the Chatter CollaborationGroup. To invite a customer, set SharedEntityId to the ID of the private CollaborationGroup with Allow Customers turned on.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the invitation. Possible values are: Sent Accepted Canceled

fields.description: The ID of the request that initiated a callout.

fields.name: RequestFormSize
fields.description: Continuation request form size, in bytes. Depending on how many HTTP requests were used in a continuation, this field can contain up to three space-separated values.

fields.name: RequestIdentifier
fields.description: The unique ID of a single transaction. A transaction can contain one or more events. Each event in a given transaction has the same REQUEST_ID.

fields.name: ResponseSize
fields.description: The size of the callout response, in bytes. Depending on how many HTTP requests were used in a continuation, this field can contain up to three space-separated values.

fields.name: StatusCode
fields.description: The HTTP status or internal code returned by the remote endpoint. A status code of 200 indicates that the request was successful. Other status code values indicate the type of problem that was encountered. Depending on how many HTTP requests were used in a continuation, this field can contain up to three space-separated values.

fields.name: Timestamp
fields.description: The access time of Salesforce services in GMT. For example, 20130715233322.670 .

fields.name: Url
fields.description: The callout endpoint URL. Depending on how many HTTP requests were used in a continuation, this field can contain up to three space-separated values.

fields.name: UserIdentifier
fields.description: The 15-character ID of the user who’s using Salesforce services through the UI or the API. For example: 00530000009M943 .

fields.name: VisualforceControllerSize
fields.description: Continuation Visualforce controller size, in bytes. Depending on how many HTTP requests were used in a continuation, this field can contain up to three space-separated values.

fields.name: ContentSize
fields.description: The size of the document in bytes for documents smaller than 2 GB. In API version 66.0 and later, we recommend that you use the ContentSizeLong field even for documents smaller than 2 GB.

fields.name: ContentSizeLong
fields.description: The size of the document in bytes up to 10 GB. This field is available in API version 66.0 and later.

fields.name: ContentUrl
fields.description: URL for links and Google Docs. This field is set only for links and Google Docs, and is one of the fields that determine the FileType . This field is available in API version 31.0 and later.

fields.name: ExternalDataSourceName
fields.description: The name of the external data source in which the document is stored. This field is set only for external documents that are connected to Salesforce. This field is available in API version 32.0 and later.

fields.name: ExternalDataSourceType
fields.description: Type of external data source in which the document is stored. This field is set only for external documents that are connected to Salesforce. This field is available in API version 35.0 and later.

fields.name: FileExtension
fields.description: File extension of the document. This field is available in API version 31.0 and later.

fields.name: FileType
fields.description: Type of document, which is determined by the file extension.

fields.name: ParentId
fields.description: The ID of the parent object.

fields.name: RecordType
fields.description: The parent object type.

fields.name: SharingOption
fields.description: Controls whether sharing is frozen for a file. Only Salesforce admins and file owners with Collaborator access to the file can modify this field. The default is Allowed , which means that new shares are allowed. When set to Restricted , new shares are prevented without affecting existing shares. This field is available in API versions 35.0 and later.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Title of the attached file.

fields.name: Name

fields.name: CurrencyIsoCode

fields.name: LastViewedDate
fields.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it can mean that the record was only referenced ( LastReferencedDate ) and not viewed.

fields.description: The input mappings from the object fields to the variables used in the commission calculation.

fields.name: CalcProcessOutputConvNotation
fields.description: An optimized version of the CalcProcessOutput formula that calculates the commission. Not user-editable.

fields.name: CalculationProcessName
fields.description: The name of the Integration Procedure, Calculation Matrix, or Calculation Procedure this Commission Schedule uses for calculations.

fields.name: CalculationType

fields.name: CommissionAmount
fields.description: The commission amount for the Commission Schedule when the process type is Amount.

fields.name: CommissionRate
fields.description: The commission percentage for the Commission Schedule when the process type is Rate.

fields.name: CommissionStructureType
fields.description: Indicates whether the commission calculation is Flat or Tiered when the process type is Matrix.

fields.name: EffectiveEndDate
